_comment_basedOn: Set basedOn to a preset name (e.g. 'deep-dark') to inherit its settings and only override what you need
_comment_accentColor: Set color to a hex value like '#0078D4'. colorPrevalence 1 shows accent on taskbar
_comment_dwm: Desktop Window Manager settings: transparency, colorization, blur, Aero Peek
_comment_taskbar: Taskbar alignment (0=left, 1=center), search mode, widget and chat visibility
_comment_colors: Classic color scheme with 26 keys. Each value is 'R G B' (e.g. '255 255 255')
_comment_cursors: Custom cursor scheme: schemeName, setFolder, and 15 role-to-filename mappings
_comment_sounds: Custom sound scheme: schemeName, setFolder, events and explorerEvents mappings
_comment_visualStyles: Path to .msstyles file, colorStyle, size, transparency and composition toggles
_comment_desktopIcons: Paths to .ico files for computer, documents, network, recycleBinFull, recycleBinEmpty
_comment_advanced: registryOverrides: array of {path, name, value, type}. thirdParty: tool executable paths
